articles.title: Tom Brady’s Last Pass Puts His Patriots Future in Doubt
articles.description: After throwing an interception on his final attempt in a playoff loss to the Tennessee Titans, Tom Brady offered little insight into whether his career with the New England Patriots was over.
articles.content:
Brady praised the team owner Robert K. Kraft and Belichick and said he loved the Patriots.
Theres nobody thats had a better career, I would say, than me, just being with them, he said.
But when his future with the Patriots came up again a few minutes later,… [+1559 chars]
